roleset.name: prevent, hinder
roleset.note: CONSTRAIN-V NOTES: Arg1 does not take -REC in this case because there is no otherinstance of that entity in this structure. "Find" would take a -RECtag, because that shows both "GM" and "itself". (from constrain.01-v)

example.name: theme and action
example.text: General Mills, meanwhile, finds itself-1 constrained *trace*-1 from boosting sales further because its plants are operating at capacity.
example.arg: because its plants are operating at capacity

example.name: ARG0 and ARG1 and ARG2
example.text: The softness of the core constrains the plastic models to No. 1 , No. 2 or No. 3 - type pencils , which account for the bulk of the market .
example.arg: to No. 1 , No. 2 or No. 3 - type pencils , which account for the bulk of the market
